projects.title: Natours
projects.description: Modern website with lots of cool animations and images by using modern cutting-edge CSS techniques : Animations with @keyframes and transition, pseudo-classes and custom CSS properties including clip-path, background-clip, mask-image, background-blend-mode, shape-outside, filter, backdrop-filter, object-fit, transform, column-count, hyphens, perspective, calc() and so on. Since this project is focused on CSS, there's no actual functions implemented.
projects.title: Phrase Hunter
projects.description: This is a travel web application that suggests cool places to visit.

projects.title: Trillo
projects.description: Modern website with lots of cool animations by using Flexbox layouts. Again, there's no actual function because this project is achieved by only CSS. Flexbox helps my life a lot easier since it took me only a couple of hours to build this website.
projects.title: Public API
projects.description: This app helps you find your favourites coffee beans by answering some questions.

projects.title: FormValidator
projects.description: Simple Modern Form with basic validation of length, email and passwords match. Simple CSS and JavaScript allow us to implement dynamic style change depending on input value. It took 1 hour to complete this mini project from scratch.
projects.title: Library Manager
projects.description: You'll find everything you need to know about Japan when you travel Japan.

projects.title: Movie Seat Booking
projects.description: Simple Movie Seat Booking UI with dynamic calculation of price depending on what user select. In addition, local storage has been used so that data stay on the browser even if user refresh the page.

projects.title: Custom Video Player
projects.description: Custom Video Player which users can manipulate a video by using benefit of html5 video API.

projects.title: Exchange Rate Calculator
projects.description: Exchange Rate Calculator App by connecting external api. You can check api document by visiting https://api.exchangerate-api.com
projects.title: React with Node.js
projects.description: Learning programming is hard when you try to master it by yourself. Let us help you learn new technology in an efficient way.
